actions.Multiattack: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d8 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Fire Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
